amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funds in the bill from being used to issue any new leases that authorize production of oil or natural gas under the Outer Continental Shelf Lands Act to any lessee under an existing lease where such lease is not providing the proper royalties based upon market price.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to limit funds for suspension of royalty relief.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hinchey amendment (A014) Agreed to by recorded vote: 252 - 165 (Roll no. 167).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A014) offered by Mr. Hinchey.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hinchey amendment (A014) Agreed to by recorded vote: 252 - 165 (Roll no. 167).
